page.title: 04Opportunity Playgroup
page.content: The Windmills Opportunity Playgroup was established in 1984 to serve parts of Burgess Hill, Hassocks and Hurstpierpoint. It caters for{children {with special needs}which may vary from social deprivation to mental handicap. It meets at the Mill Road Clinic, Burgess Hill. Most of the playgroup's staff are volunteers, although it does employ one organiser. It is mainly funded my local charities such as the Burgess Hill and Hassocks Round Table and the Inner Wheel. Some local schools and playgroups have also organised fund raising events for it. This includes some pupils from Downlands School. It receives a small grant from the Social Services Department and uses the Mill Road Clinic free by courtesy of the Mid_Downs Heath Authority.
